name: Picking Up The Pieces (afells)
description:
This is Picking Up The Pieces this is my submission for the brackeys game jam 2021.1 the theme is "Stronger Together"

In this game, the player plays as a heart that gets stronger collecting other hearts in order to become whole. The player gets stronger visually and better movement. Some used code from "2D Movement in Unity (Tutorial)" on the brackeys youtube channel.

The controls are WASD or the arrow keys and spacebar. I recommend full screen.

I hope you enjoy my game :D
